name: metamorphic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of rock) changed into a new form and structure by very great heat and pressure: Slate and gneiss are metamorphic rocks. Compare
igneous
sedimentary

earth science describes rocks changed to a new form as a result of physical processes, such as pressure or heat metamorphism noun [ U ]
